txt.en: The Red Sky Clan of Bhol Rûdh is up against impossible odds in their conflict with the forces of Seregost.
You have successfully saved the Red Sky Clan and gathered many ancient Wose lights.

A notice is pinned to the board:

'Wose lights can be found in Bhol Rûdh. A brave adventurer is needed to recover Wose lights so that they are not lost to the enemy. Seek out Candúr in Udûn to learn more.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Bhol Rûdh: Siege of Corruption to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
The Ancient Lights of Bhol Rûdh
Candúr can be found in Udûn.\n\nYou should talk Candúr.
